TEXT.TITLE: GRAIN SHIPS WAITING AT NEW ORLEANS
TEXT.BODY: Ten grain ships were loading and 14 were waiting to load at New Orleans elevators, trade sources said. ELEVATOR LOADING WAITING Continental Grain, Westwego 1 6 Mississippi River, Myrtle Grove 1 0 ADM Growmark 1 4 Bunge Grain, Destrehan 1 0 ELEVATOR LOADING WAITING ST CHARLES DESTREHAN 1 1 RESERVE ELEVATOR CORP 1 0 PEAVEY CO, ST ELMO 1 0 CARGILL GRAIN, TERRE HAUTE 2 1 CARGILL GRAIN, PORT ALLEN 0 0 ZEN-NOH 1 2 reuter
